title: Canon PowerShot G1X Mark II Compact Digital Camera English OK Black
description:
Whether you're just starting out or looking to upgrade your photography gear, the Canon PowerShot G1X Mark II is a fantastic choice. This compact digital camera delivers sharp images, vibrant colors, and full HD 1080p video recording. It features a large 1.5-inch 12.8MP CMOS sensor, fast f/2.0-3.9 lens, and a tilting touchscreen—perfect for everything from wide-angle landscapes to close-up portraits.

Features:
- 12.8 Megapixel 1.5-inch CMOS Sensor
- Full HD 1080p Video with Manual Controls
- 3.0” Tilting Touchscreen LCD
- ISO 100–12800 – great for low light
- Fast f/2.0-3.9 zoom lens (24-120mm equivalent)
- Wi-Fi & NFC connectivity
- In-camera creative filters

Condition: Gently used and in great working order. Clean body and lens. All buttons, dials, and functions operate perfectly.

What’s Included:
- Canon PowerShot G1X Mark II Camera Body
- Battery & Charger
- Camera Strap

Fast shipping and secure checkout at HappyDeel.
